attributes.action: To permanently ban all open public Air Shows
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Air Shows however fun they maybe. Are actually a very high risk hazard to the public who are watching these shows. Air shows have a large percentage in the total number of air accidents.

In these shows especially military air shows. High speed combat aircraft which have standard operating altitudes of a minimum of 5000ft are expected to pull off dangerous maneouvres in a low altitude, leaving very little room for human error.

When errors do happen the aircraft can land anywhere from a residential area to a large crowd causing devastation. In which the pilot normally walks away unscathed as they have ejected from the aircraft leaving its collision trajectory unknown.
